snippet: Defending champions Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams will be hoping to get the Australian Open off to a sizzling start when they play back-to-back on Rod Laver Arena on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Defending champions Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams will be hoping to get the Australian Open off to a sizzling start when they play back-to-back on Rod Laver Arena on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Serena Hot to Trot on Day One in Steamy Melbourne
headline.main: Djokovic, Serena Hot to Trot on Day One in Steamy Melbourne
